summary: Ticketing Configuration Feature Testing - All APIs and UI working correctly. Backend: 21/21 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All 7 tabs verified working.

sla_policies.notes: 3 default policies seeded: Critical (1h), Standard (4h), Extended (8h)

departments.notes: 4 default departments seeded: Support, Technical, Field Service, Billing

custom_forms.notes: Supports multiple field types: text, textarea, number, email, select, date, checkbox

help_topics.notes: Tab working, empty state shown with Add Topic button

masters.notes: 6 master types with seeded data: Ticket Statuses (7), Priorities (4), Problem Types (8), Visit Types (4), Service Categories (4), Resolution Types (6)

notifications.notes: Tab working, empty state shown with Seed Defaults option

issues: Console warning: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility improvement needed

critical_code_review_comments: All CRUD operations properly implemented with organization_id scoping
Seed defaults are idempotent - won't duplicate data on multiple calls
Template variables in canned responses preserved correctly
Priority multipliers in SLA policies stored and retrieved correctly
Custom forms support complex field types with validation
seed_data_creation: Default SLA policies and Departments were already seeded. One canned response exists for testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Ticketing Configuration feature is fully implemented and working. All 7 tabs (Help Topics, Custom Forms, Canned Responses, Departments, SLA Policies, Masters, Notifications) are functional. Backend APIs for CRUD operations on Canned Responses, SLA Policies, Departments, and Custom Forms are all working correctly with proper organization scoping.
